An apology for a yovnger brother, or, A discovrse proving that parents may dispose of their estates to which of their children they please by I. A. J. A. (John Ap Robert)
[10], 56 p.
Printed by Leonard Lichfield for Edward Forrest, Oxford : 1641.
Epistle signed: J. A. Attributed to Ap Robert by Madan, BM, and Halkett and Laing. Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
=======
